name: ImageJ filter frangiVesselness
title: ImageJ filter frangiVesselness
description: Applies the Frangi Vesselness filter to an input collection to highlight vessel-like structures
author: Nick Schaub (nick.schaub@nih.gov), Anjali Taneja, Benjamin Houghton (benjamin.houghton@axleinfo.com)
institution: National Center for Advancing Translational Sciences, National Institutes of Health

inputs.name: inpDir
inputs.description: Collection to be processed by this plugin

inputs.name: spacing
inputs.description: The physical distance between data points in the  image, can vary for each dimension of the image.

items.title: The physical distance between data points in the  image, can vary for each dimension of the image.
